subject: A new transliterator idea
msgSnippet: Automated transliterators are simple and fast but break down on one thorn of O.T: HOMOGRAPHS. Words with different pronunciations and meanings but spelled the
messageBody:
Automated transliterators are simple and fast but break down on one
thorn of O.T: HOMOGRAPHS. Words with different pronunciations and
meanings but spelled the same. Like Lives(plural of life) and Lives
(present third person tense of to live). A better transliterator would
allow the user to choose their desired transliteration of a word and
save it. The program would also give an "ask me" option assignable for
pesky homographs.
